A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Can’t believe they thought this was going to be good. So much wrong with this\, felt like Space Balls more then Star Wars. Corny\, cheesy forced jokes and bad comedy\, average action and next to no real storyline. I don’t feel the writers moved this saga along or even developed characters. It felt like a TV series episode\, like they didn’t have enough time so they just went for money shot moments and didn’t explain anything. Without trying to spoil anything what I believe was the plot was the slowest paced outer space chase in history of cinematography. Whole you kept waiting for something to happen it never did. Too the younger kids out there joining Star Wars now\, do yourself a favor and watch episodes 4-5-6 and leave it at that.
